attributes.action: The law MUST be changed so that a life sentence means exactly that.
attributes.additional_details: This man targeted the most vulnerable children in society in the most depraved, repulsive and cold-hearted way. Read the BBC News report, see how he likens a 3 year old girl to a loyal dog who nobody cared that he was abusing. Then sign the petition http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-36458472
attributes.background: Richard Huckle. This man raped children from 6 months to 12 years. One girl from the age of 5 until 12. Filmed it. Shared it. Made money from it. Scored himself with 'paedo points'. Admitted 71 acts of abuse of 200+ babies and children. Given 22 life sentences. May serve 23 years. Is this justice?
